short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to track how many times you've watched YouTube videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hellu! Do you want me to write a lot here?
That's just a YT personal views counter.
I have seen somebody made this, but:
1. It workes incorrect. One view equels to 4 - 7 views.
2. After 634 "views" counter stops forever.
I tried to solve that.
Have fun ;)

fck design!
